title.narrative: Emergency Support for Human Rights Defenders in Exile Affected by the Covid19 Crisis

description.narrative: This action provides emergency, short terms support to the livelihoods of sixty human rights defenders (HRDs) living in exile in Kampala. It involves the provision of direct cash transfers to help HRDs meet their basic needs, including accommodation, clothing and food; and provision for psychosocial counselling for HRDs. The action also envisages a dialogue component with UNHCR and other key stakeholders in Uganda to ensure a more sustainable approach to supporting this key group of HRDs.
